c:errors.c:error: ro.sync.exml.o.c.i - key: invalid_element_value, args ["pagenum", ; must be an integer]

ro.sync.exml.o.c.i - key: out_of_context_element, args ["level2", ; expected the element end-tag or element "a", "address", "annotation", "author", "blockquote", "bridgehead", "byline", "cite", "covertitle", "dateline", "div", "dl", "docauthor", "doctitle", "epigraph", "img", "imggroup", "kbd", "level3", "line", "linegroup", "list", "m:math", "note", "p", "pagenum", "poem", "prodnote", "samp", "sidebar" or "table"]

ro.sync.exml.o.c.i - key: out_of_context_element, args ["h3", ; expected element "a", "address", "annotation", "author", "blockquote", "bridgehead", "byline", "cite", "covertitle", "dateline", "div", "dl", "docauthor", "doctitle", "epigraph", "h2", "img", "imggroup", "kbd", "level3", "line", "linegroup", "list", "m:math", "note", "p", "pagenum", "poem", "prodnote", "samp", "sidebar" or "table"]
